title: KOOMPI OS

title: SALA KOOMPI
subtitle: E-Learning
desc: A virtual school that allows both students and teachers to view and provide learning resources. School admins and teachers can sign up as members of a virtual school on the platform and distribute lessons exclusively to their students as well.
